channel.title: Storybooks Kenya
channel.description: Storybooks Kenya is designed specifically for teachers, parents, and community members. It makes 40 stories from the African Storybook available in English and Swahili, as well as all the major regional and immigrant languages of Kenya (with text and audio in Amharic, Arabic, Embu / Kîembu, English, Gujarati, Ekegusii, Kamba / Kikamba, Gikuyu / Kikuyu, Kalenjin, Luganda, Olukhayo, Luo / Dholuo, Luhya / Oluluhya, Pokomo / Kipfokomo, Maa / Maasai, Meru / Kimîîru, Giryama / Kigiryama, Oromo / Afaan Oromo, Rendille, Samburu, Somali, Swahili / Kiswahili, and Turkana / Ng‘aturkana, among others).
